title: Fool's Silver
description: Could you chose between the ones you love . . . ?A gorgeous boyfriend and a long summer in Winter Mill to look forward to - things are good for Faye McCarron.Then her friend Lucas disappears without a trace. But nobody seems to care - until two strangers arrive in town . . .Faye and Finn leave Winter Mill to try and find Lucas. But with Finn struggling to adjust to his new role as leader of the wolf pack, and unknown evil forces working against them, will they save their friend before it's too late?Love paranormal romance, werewolves and immortal villains? Then this book is for you!
author: Alice Moss
